name: Curse of the Tomb
description:
Robbers have entered you tomb! Curse the objects in your tomb to stop them.

Move: WASD keys

Zoom: Mouse Wheel

Curse: Left click

Thanks to kenney.nl for this jam and all the assets used. 

There's no audio.

A cautionary tale. 

60 before the end of this jam I try to build the game and it won't build. The error messages in the console aren't helpful and it takes me 62 minutes of struggle to learn about the editor log file which leads me to an errant "using UnityEditorInternal" in one of my scripts that was causing the error. 

So I'm too late to submit. Whatever. I'm going to publish it anyway. So I spend time setting up this page and put the build on itch. 

The player stops loading at 90%. 30 minutes later I got it to work by turning off compression in the publishing settings. 

Lesson learned: build your project whenever you take a break so it doesn't break when you need to build it.
